mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( ar.RUN_ID ) AS allCount, DATEDIFF( #{endTime}, #{startTime} ) / COUNT( ar.RUN_ID ) AS avgCount, SUM( ar.RUN_TIME ) AS allRunTime, SUM( ar.MILEAGE ) AS allMileage FROM APP_RUN ar WHERE ar.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ar.CREATE_TIME > #{startTime} AND ar.CREATE_TIME < #{endTime}
